body.p: Post-deployment actions take place automatically right after an application is deployed.
body.note: Currently, only StormRunner integration is supported.

ol.li: Select the target project and click Edit.
Scroll down and click New Action.

Specify the information for the action.
For StormRunner load testing, you will need the Username, Password, Test Number, Tenant ID, and Action Name.
Select the target project and click Edit.
Scroll down and click the action.
Change the information for the action.
